node.excerpt: For me, and for many other, middle school was a challenging time.
So maybe you are having a private struggle but you are wondering if it is a  real  problem. With so much silence around the issue, and…

frontmatter.title: So what are we hiding and why?

node.excerpt: I want to answer the question in the title by explaining the dynamic of the sexual struggle that so many share, and hopefully solidify why…
